short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your tasks with a score of importance and urgency like it's 1984.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple to-do list tracker that displays your list in a popup modal when the extension icon is clicked.

The extension also has a main page where tasks can be added or deleted. On this page, users assign urgency and importance ratings (from 1-10) to each task, then a "Task Rating" is calculated to determine the task's priority. 

When a task is complete, the "Completion Score" will increase by the Task Rating.

How high can your Completion score get?
